channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP BW/4HANA (DW4CORE)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP BW/4HANA (DW4CORE)

item.title: CVE-2019-0243|2024-08-04T17:44:15.938Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20bw%2F4hana%20%28dw4core%29
item.description: Under some circumstances, masterdata maintenance in SAP BW/4HANA (fixed in DW4CORE version 1.0 (SP08)) does not perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges.
